TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WellKnownServiceTypeEntry extends System.Runtime.Remoting.TypeEntry

summary.span: 将在服务端注册的对象类型的值保存为服务器激活类型对象（单个调用或 singleton）。

span.span: Holds values for an object type registered on the service end as a server-activated type object (single call or singleton).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服务器激活的对象类型可以是单个调用或单一实例。Server-activated object types can be either single call or singleton. 如果对象类型，单个调用它的新实例创建每次从客户端调用传入中时。If an object type is single call, a new instance of it is created each time a call from the client comes in. 由该对象的一个实例处理对单一实例对象的所有调用。All calls to a singleton object are handled by one instance of that object. 知道此对象的 URI 的任何客户端可以通过注册使用其首选的信道获取此对象的代理和激活该对象通过调用`new`或。Any client that knows the URI of this object can obtain a proxy for this object by registering the channel it prefers with and activating the object by calling `new` or . 请务必注意远程对象本身不由注册过程。It is important to note that the remote object itself is not created by the registration process. 这仅情况当客户端试图对对象调用方法，或从客户端激活该对象。This only happens when a client attempts to call a method on the object or activates the object from the client side. 有关服务器激活的对象和远程对象激活的更多详细说明，请参阅[ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e90d0c64-00da-4080-ae78-a6c558825c25)。For a more detailed description of server-activated objects and remote object activation, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e90d0c64-00da-4080-ae78-a6c558825c25). ## Examples [!code-cpp[WellKnownServiceTypeEntry_Server#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WellKnownServiceTypeEntry_Server/CPP/wellknownservicetypeentry_server.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[WellKnownServiceTypeEntry_Server#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WellKnownServiceTypeEntry_Server/CS/wellknownservicetypeentry_server.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WellKnownServiceTypeEntry_Server#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/WellKnownServiceTypeEntry_Server/VB/wellknownservicetypeentry_server.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置服务器激活服务类型的上下文特性。

span.span: Gets or sets the context attributes for the server-activated service type.

value.span: 获取或设置服务器激活服务类型的上下文特性。

span.span: Gets or sets the context attributes for the server-activated service type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前，此索引器未实现，对它的操作不会生成任何结果。Currently, this indexer is not implemented and operations on it will not produce any results. 上下文属性提供上下文属性，这些时添加到上下文，则可以强制执行诸如同步和事务等的策略。Context attributes provide context properties that, when added to a context, can enforce policies such as synchronization and transactions.
